body.name: PRETTYCARE Cordless Vacuum Cleaner, 6 in 1 Lightweight Stick Vacuum Self-Standing with Powerful Suction, 180° Bendable Wand Rechargeable Cordless Vacuum for Hardwood Floor Pet Hair (Blue)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18. Order within 1 hr 9 mins
features: 🏡【SELF-STANDING & BENDABLE WAND】: The cordless stick vacuum cleaner comes with a Self-Standing design, allowing you to place wireless vacuum cleaner anywhere you want. Vacuum cleaner wireless's 180° Bendable Wand helps you clean those dead corners under the cabinet, bed, or any other hard-to-reach areas without bending over.

🏘️【6 STAGE DOUBLE-CYCLONE FILTRATION】: Vacuum cleaner stick's breakthrough 6-Stage Double-Cyclone Filtration System ensures that 99.98% of microscopic dust particles as small as 0.1 microns are filtered out, providing you and your family with fresh air. Stick vacuum cleaner cordless upgraded Double Cyclone Filter provides Powerful Suction + Secondary Refiltration so that no dust can escape upright vacuum cleaner and your notice.

🏚️【POWERFUL SUCTION & LARGE-CAPACITY BATTERY】: Vacuum cleaner bagless features a powerful motor with 20,000Pa suction / 2 speed levels , household vacuum cleaners can easily complete deep cleaning for carpets, hardwood floors, and pet hair. Equipped with 6* Large-Capacity Batteries and Super Fast Charging, the long runtime of this vacuum cleaner carpet can meet your daily cleaning needs perfectly.

🏦【6-IN-1 & LIGHTWEIGHT】: Sofa vacuum cleaner have 6-in-1 combination of attachments, including a 2-in-1 brush head, long crevice tool, and two cotton filters etc. Pet hair vacuum cleaner can deep clean curtains, beds, floors, carpets, and any dead corners. Under 3 pounds, this lightweight portable vacuum cleaner ensures that house cleaning is no longer tiring.

🏠【FLEXIBLE LED BRUSH & MULTIFUNCTIONAL USE】: Bagless vacuum cleaner's 90+180° flexible stick brush with strong LED headlights can easily adjust the angle to clean particles and dust in dark places. Carpet vacuum cleaner with a 1.2L large-capacity dust container and One-Click Dust Release, this vacuum cleaner pet makes cleaning easier than ever. NOTE: after washing the dust cup and cotton filters, please make sure they are thoroughly dry before use again.

productInformation.name: Recommended Uses For Product
productInformation.value: ☀️Roller Brush: suitable for wooden floors, tiled floors, short-haired carpets, and more⭐. ☀️Foldable Metal Tube: cleaning of sofas, cabinets, and under the bed. Also suitable for elderly people or those with lumbar disc discomfort⭐. ☀️2 in 1 Dust Brush: suitable for keyboards, sofa surfaces, desktops, curtains, and more⭐. ☀️Long Crevice Tool: suitable for gaps in sofas, cabinets, window tracks, bookshelves, and more⭐. ☀️Self-Standing Function: simple placement at any time and anywhere. Easily clean while moving furniture⭐. ☀️Filter: can be replaced every 3-5 months，dump or wash daily，(be sure to completely air dry after cleaning before using again)⭐

productInformation.name: Specific instructions for use
productInformation.value: 😍The vacuum cleaner has an self-standing function. It can be placed anywhere at any time, which is very convenient for storage and movement. 👍The cordless vacuum uses a folding tube, which allows you to clean with less bending over during daily cleaning. Even when cleaning low areas such as sofas or under the bed, it can be easily handled. 🍃With a six-layer filtration system, the vacuum cleaner thoroughly filters out dirt and debris, giving you fresh air and a clean house. ♻️With multiple brush heads, it can clean not only floors but also sofas, keyboards, air conditioning , curtains, and more. 🎁It's A Perfect Gift for Your Families and Friends!
